SELECT emp.*, dep.name AS dep_name, sal.id AS sid, sal.`name` AS sname, sal.basic_salary AS sbasic_salary, sal.lunch_salary AS slunch_salary, sal.traffic_salary AS straffic_salary, sal.pension_base AS spension_base, sal.pension_per AS spension_per, sal.medical_base AS smedical_base, sal.medical_per AS smedical_per, sal.accumulation_fund_base AS saccumulation_fund_base, sal.accumulation_fund_per AS saccumulation_fund_per FROM t_employee emp LEFT JOIN t_salary sal ON emp.salary_id=sal.id LEFT JOIN t_department dep ON emp.department_id=dep.id WHERE emp.is_delete = FALSE AND emp.work_state = '在职'
AND emp.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
ORDER BY emp.id

SELECT emp.*, sal.id AS sid, sal.`name` AS sname, sal.basic_salary AS sbasic_salary, sal.lunch_salary AS slunch_salary, sal.traffic_salary AS straffic_salary, sal.pension_base AS spension_base, sal.pension_per AS spension_per, sal.medical_base AS smedical_base, sal.medical_per AS smedical_per, sal.accumulation_fund_base AS saccumulation_fund_base, sal.accumulation_fund_per AS saccumulation_fund_per FROM t_employee emp, t_salary sal WHERE emp.salary_id = sal.id AND emp.work_state = '在职'
SELECT pos.`name` AS `name`, COUNT(*) AS `count` FROM t_employee emp, t_position pos WHERE emp.is_delete = FALSE AND emp.work_state = '在职' AND emp.position_id = pos.id GROUP BY pos.`name`
SELECT dep.`name` AS `name`, COUNT(*) AS `count` FROM t_employee emp, t_department dep WHERE emp.is_delete = FALSE AND emp.work_state = '在职' AND emp.department_id = dep.id GROUP BY dep.`name`

SELECT nnd AS `name`, COUNT(*) AS `count` FROM
( SELECT CASE WHEN YEAR (NOW()) - YEAR (emp.birthday) < 24 THEN '24以下' WHEN YEAR (NOW()) - YEAR (emp.birthday) >= 24 AND YEAR (NOW()) - YEAR (emp.birthday) < 29 THEN '24-29' WHEN YEAR (NOW()) - YEAR (emp.birthday) >= 29 AND YEAR (NOW()) - YEAR (emp.birthday) < 34 THEN '29-34' WHEN YEAR (NOW()) - YEAR (emp.birthday) >= 34 AND YEAR (NOW()) - YEAR (emp.birthday) < 39 THEN '34-39' WHEN YEAR (NOW()) - YEAR (emp.birthday) >= 39 AND YEAR (NOW()) - YEAR (emp.birthday) < 44 THEN '39-44' WHEN YEAR (NOW()) - YEAR (emp.birthday) >= 44 AND YEAR (NOW()) - YEAR (emp.birthday) < 49 THEN '44-49' WHEN YEAR (NOW()) - YEAR (emp.birthday) >= 49 AND YEAR (NOW()) - YEAR (emp.birthday) < 55 THEN '49-55' WHEN YEAR (NOW()) - YEAR (emp.birthday) >= 55 THEN '55以上' END AS nnd, department_id AS departmentId FROM t_employee emp WHERE emp.work_state = '在职' ) a WhERE 1 = 1
AND departmentId = #{depId}
GROUP BY nnd

SELECT gld AS `name`, COUNT(*) AS `count` FROM
( SELECT CASE WHEN emp.work_age < 1 THEN '1以下' WHEN emp.work_age >= 1 AND emp.work_age < 2 THEN '1-2' WHEN emp.work_age >= 2 AND emp.work_age < 5 THEN '2-5' WHEN emp.work_age >= 5 AND emp.work_age < 10 THEN '5-10' WHEN emp.work_age >= 10 THEN '10以上' END AS gld, department_id AS departmentId FROM t_employee emp WHERE emp.work_state = '在职' ) a WHERE 1 = 1
AND departmentId = #{depId}
GROUP BY gld

SELECT dep.`name` AS `name`, SUM(st.all_salary) / COUNT(*) AS `count` FROM t_employee emp, t_department dep, t_salary_table st WHERE emp.is_delete = FALSE AND emp.work_state = '在职' AND emp.department_id = dep.id AND emp.id = st.employee_id
AND date_format(st.gmt_create,'%Y-%m-%d') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{localDate},'%')
GROUP BY dep.`name`

SELECT pos.`name` AS `name`, SUM(st.all_salary) / COUNT(*) AS `count` FROM t_employee emp, t_position pos, t_salary_table st WHERE emp.is_delete = FALSE AND emp.work_state = '在职' AND emp.position_id = pos.id AND emp.id = st.employee_id
AND date_format(st.gmt_create,'%Y-%m-%d') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{localDate},'%')
